title: Shooting in downtown Austin
content:
AUSTIN -
There are reports of multiple shots fired in two separate locations just after 2 am in Austin have left one person dead, and 4 others injured according to police.
Austin-Travis County EMS say multiple units responded to the area of 208 East 6th St.
Police said they are investigating separate shooting scenes in the same area of downtown Austin, but that all scenes are secure.
It is unclear if the shooter is in police custody.
